Hi all,

We are two students of the University of Padova, Italy. We are att=
empting a large crawl using the Heritrix crawler (version 1.14.4). The fron=
tier we are using is the bdbfrontier. We noticed that using this frontier, =
the crawler is constantly accessing the disk, performing small reads/writes=
 that 
 a) are inefficient in terms of aggregated disk I/O  
 b) move the d=
isk head a lot, which is not very healthy for the disk itself. In fact, we =
have already lost multiple disks in the process. 

Is there some way to avo=
id this problem?

Thanks for the help

Matteo Ceccarello,
Alessandro Secco
